title: Zero-Day Hunter
description: Automated vulnerability scanner designed to detect unidentified exploits in legacy architecture. Deployed on 50+ enterprise nodes for real-time threat analysis.
fullDescription: Zero-Day Hunter is an advanced AI-driven scanner that identifies novel vulnerabilities by analyzing execution patterns and memory leaks in real-time.
writeup:
# How Zero-Day Hunter Works

## The Engine
Built on a custom Rust core, the engine performs static and dynamic analysis to identify potential overflow conditions before they are triggered.

### Metrics
- **Detection Rate**: 98%
- **Latency**: < 50ms
- **Support**: x86, ARM64
